survey.question: How much did you enjoy the task?
How difficult was it to communicate with your partner?

How difficult was it to understand your partner's instructions?

chat.msg: Welcome!
HELLO
Hello, how can I assist you today?
WHERE ARE YOU ON THE MAP?
I'm currently at the starting point of the map. To my left, there is a twig leading to a small island with a tiger on it.
THAT'S GOOD, CAN YOU LOCATE THE ROUTE?
Sure, which route would you like me to locate?
YOU WILL WALK ACROSS THE ISLAND WITH THE TIGER ON IT

Got it, I will cross the small island with the tiger on it. 

Now that I crossed the island, I encountered a fork and there are three available paths - South, South-East, and South-West. Which path should I take?
YOU WILL SEE A PARROT ON THE NEXT ISLAND

Great! I'll take the South-West path and continue on my journey.

I have now arrived at the big island with the Parrot sitting on a tree. Should I continue along this island or is there another direction I should take?
YOU SHOULD LOOK ACROSS , YOU WILL A FROG ACROSS THE OTHER ISLAND

Got it, thanks! I'm now heading south-east along this island towards three rocks that lead to a new island. After crossing the rocks, I have arrived at the next island and I now see the frog across another island.

Which direction should I go from here? Do I take a left to the crocodile or continue straight ahead towards the frog?

chat.msg: Welcome!
WHERE ARE YOU ON THE MAP?
I am currently at the starting point, next to the white dog.
WALK ACROSS THE DRY PATH TOWARDS THE SOLAR
I'm sorry, I don't see any dry path or solar on the map. Could you please give me another direction to follow?
TAKE SOUTH AND WALK ACROSS
If I understand correctly, you want me to take the path leading south from the starting point. Do you want me to follow it until the end or is there a specific landmark I should be looking for?
YOU NWOULD SEE A WOOD THAT PROVIDES A CROSSING PATH TOWARDS ANOTHER DOG

Thank you for the instruction. I took the southern path and I can see the wooden branch you mentioned. I am now crossing it and approaching another white dog sitting next to a red and white picnic carpet. What's the next step?
MOVE ACROSS THE MAPT AND TAKE THE WOODEN STEP ACROSS
I'm sorry, I'm not sure which way to move across the map. Could you please provide another instruction to help me navigate to the final destination?
MAT
I'm sorry, I'm not sure what you mean by "MAT". Could you please provide more details or a specific instruction?

chat.msg: Welcome!
HELLO
Hello, how can I assist you with the map today?
WALK ACROSS THE MAP TILL YOU GET TO THE DOG
Sure, I'm walking south from the tent and I see a dog sitting to the left of the fire. I'm approaching the dog, what should I do next?
TAKE YOUR LEFT AND WALK TOWARDS THE CAR
Great, I turned left at the dog and now I see the fire behind me and a red mushroom to the right. I'm heading towards the blue car which is south of the mushroom. What's next?
TAKE THE RIGHT TURN ON YOUR PATH TILL YOU GET TO A CANNON

Sorry, there is no mention of a cannon on the map. Can you please double-check the instructions or provide further guidance? Perhaps there is an object on the map that looks similar to a cannon but with a different name?
BOMB
I apologize but there is no object marked as a "bomb" on the map. However, I do see a blue telescope to the south of the blue car. Do you want me to head towards it?
YES
Alright, I am now heading south from the blue car towards the blue telescope. I have just arrived at the telescope. What's next?
YOU WILL SEE A HOUSE ACROSS THE BLUS TELESCOPE
Understood. I am now facing the blue telescope. To my right, I see some rocks surrounding a wooden house. Is this the house you were referring to?
LOCATE THE HOUSE
I am currently standing west of the blue telescope facing east. I can see the house to my right-hand side. Do you want me to start making my way towards it?
YES

Great. I am now walking towards the house. I see a path leading towards it. I am following the path and making my way to the house. 

...and I have arrived at the wooden house. *finished* 

Is there anything else I can help you with?
